meanings.definition: A horizontal support across the top of a door or window.
meanings.sent1: The lintol above the door kept the structure stable.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter installed a new lintol above the window.
meanings.sent3: The lintol above the door told jokes to the window sill.
meanings.sent4: The lintol stood strong like a bridge connecting two walls.
meanings.sent5: The lintol's presence was as essential as the foundation of the building.

meanings.sent1: They will lintol the new house to ensure proper support.
meanings.sent2: The builders will lintol the windows before painting.
meanings.sent3: I lintolled the doorway with care, making sure it was level.
meanings.sent4: She lintols the openings with precision, like an artist adding final touches.
meanings.sent5: Lintolling the structure guarantees its durability for years to come.
